original_title: Constitutional Council to meet on Wednesday (2)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Constitutional Council is due to convene on Wednesday (02), chaired by Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardhane.
Approval is due to be given to appoint new members to fill the two vacancies in the National Election Commission, during Wednesday's (02) meeting.
Recommendations to appoint a member to fill the vacancy of the National Police Commission will also be presented during the Constitutional Council meeting.
Newsline | North needs federalism | C. V. Vigneswaran | 2nd Aug 2023

Conspiracy surrounds failure to irrigate rice fields in the south
